info.description: Scale unit operation endpoints and objects.
info.title: FabricAdminClient

get.description: Returns a list of all scale units at a location.

parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

schema.description: A pageable list of scale units.

location.description: The region where the resource is located.

items.description: Represents a cluster. Generally, the cluster will be a collection of hosts backed by failover cluster manager.

isMultiNode.description: Denotes if more than one node in cluster.

logicalFaultDomain.description: Fault domain name of the cluster.

model.description: Model of the servers in the cluster.

nodes.description: List of nodes in the server.

cores.description: The number of CPU cores for the physical machine.

memoryGB.description: The memory for the physical machine.

schema.description: A list of input data that allows for adding a set of scale unit nodes.

awaitStorageConvergence.description: Flag indicates if the operation should wait for storage to converge before returning.

nodeList.description: List of nodes in the scale unit.

items.description: Input data that allows for adding a scale unit node.

bmcIpv4Address.description: BMC address of the physical machine.

computerName.description: Computer name of the physical machine.
